overview: Dan Foygel has over a decade of experience building massively scalable software platforms. Before joining EchoSign, Foygel was a Senior Engineer at Carbon Five, a boutique Java development firm serving the financial services and other industries. Previously, he served as Director of Customer Engineering at enterprise software company Lithium Technologies; as Software Architect at Ofoto/Kodak; and as a Software Engineer at Coolsavings.com. Foygel holds a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign and an M.S. in Computer Science from Carnegie Mellon University.
